item.description:
Geek Week has returned to Improv Boston, starting April 28 and lasting through May 2. I will be performing on opening night and invite you all to come see me perform in Science Fiction Novel and Dingopoly. My show is at 7:30 p.m. in the Studio of the theatre. Tickets are $10 each or $7 for students.

After my show, we can either catch another act (Red Alert! and FutureProv at 9 p.m. and/or Talk Nerdy to Me at 10 p.m.) or grab a bite to eat. At 11:30 p.m., there is a show called Deep Dish featuring improvisors from Improv Boston, Improv Asylum and Second City (Chicago) for a mere $5.

We can communicate via email. You will be responsible for getting your own ticket either online or the night of the show. I can meet you in the lobby between 7 and 7:15 but then have to get ready. So if I don't see you before 7:15, I will meet up with all of you in the lobby after the show. I will provide my phone number to those who sign up.

If you cannot make it this night, be sure to partake of the various other shows throughout the week, including: The Dowry and Ethan; LOST - Blowing the Hatch; The Complete Works of Batman and Twitterprov: Twitterprov, Red Alert and Continuum; Mythical Newsroom and Ninja Sex Party; Maximum Power and Swartzlander; Dungeon Master Guide and Epic Adventure; Lumber Knight and Benjamin Franklin: Dinosaur Hunter and many, many more.

Check out the website at: http://www.improvbost...
item.how_to_find_us: meet in lobby between 7 and 7:15. After that, just go into Studio and we'll meet after
item.name: Geek Week Comedy Show
